description.value:
Some skittermanders have grown skeptical of the vesk and refined their collaboration instinct, developing a keen eye toward power dynamics and injustice. These skittermanders gain a +2 species bonus to Sense Motive checks, which increases to +5 when engaging with vesk and citizens of the Veskarium.

This replaces grappler.
